Flask
-----

Flask is a microframework for Python based on Werkzeug, Jinja 2 and good
intentions. And before you ask: It's BSD licensed!

Flask is Fun
````````````

::

    from flask import Flask
    app = Flask(__name__)

    @app.route("/")
    def hello():
        return "Hello World!"

    if __name__ == "__main__":
        app.run()

And Easy to Setup
`````````````````

::

    $ pip install Flask
    $ python hello.py
     * Running on http://localhost:5000/
